title: Policy combo - reduce deficit without changing AD

content.question: Which of the following policy combinations could reduce a government deficit without changing aggregate demand?

choices.label: An increase in taxes and an increase in administered interest rates
An increase in taxes and a decrease in administered interest rates
A decrease in taxes and an increase in administered interest rates
A decrease in government spending and an increase in administered interest rates
An increase in government spending and a decrease in administered interest rates

content.answer: An increase in taxes and a decrease in administered interest rates
